description:
Kyosuke is sent back in time 6 years and has the opportunity to find out about Madoka`s first love, while Madoka gets news that makes her decide to move to America.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Presentiment of Farewells. Locate Madoka`s First Love
Sayonara no Yokan Madoka no Hatsukoi o Sagase
さよならの予感まどかの初恋を探せ
